channel.title: Kathy Mitchell on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Kathy Mitchell on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – February 12, 2019
item.description: I’m exhausted. Kids rode bus. Second try to deliver cookies to Kathy, success! Talked with her awhile. Late getting kids again, supper was ready. Ashley could remember her piano homework so totally unprepared for tonight’s lesson, discussed dropping piano lessons with her. Windy!

item.title: Status Update – February 11, 2019
item.description: Kids rode bus. Started out warm, got cold and rainy as day went on. Tried to deliver Kathy Mitchell’s cookies, no one home. Picked kids up later than usual because of, Lesa had dinner on table waiting. Boys had Cub Scouts. Ashley stayed home, did science project. Big kid showers.
